<html>
  <head>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
    <style>
      /* Email styles need to be inline */
    </style>
  </head>

  <body>
    <!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <meta content='text/html; charset=UTF-8' http-equiv='Content-Type' />
  </head>
  <body>
    <p>Your dividend has been paid out.</p>
    <p><b>Receipt</b>: This is your receipt, thank you.</p>
    <a><a href="http://test.domain.com/dividends">Dividends</a></a>
  </body>
</html>


  </body>
</html>
